methods.name: IsSet
methods.doc: Returns if the optional has a valid value. This must be true in order for Get() or GetValue() to be called.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.doc: Gets a const reference to the optional's set value. IsSet() must return true for this function to be called.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.doc: Gets a non-const reference to the optional's set value. IsSet() must return true for this function to be called.

methods.name: Get
methods.doc: If set returns the optional's set value, otherwise returns DefaultValue

methods.name: Reset
methods.doc: Destruct the value inside the optional and unset it.
